org.anchoranalysis.plugin.image.feature.bean.stack.intensity

Class Intensity

  • Object
    • AnchorBean<B>
      • InitializableBean<Feature<T>,FeatureInitParams>
        • Feature<FeatureInputStack>
          • FeatureStack
            • Intensity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParamsInitializer<FeatureInitParams>

    public class Intensity
extends FeatureStack
    The intensity of a particular channel of the stack, by default the mean-intensity.

    Alternative statistics to the mean can be calculated via the item bean-field.

    Author:
    Owen Feehan
